title: Air drill for establishing cover crops
summary: a pneumatic (air) drill designed to be mounted on existing drills.

eligible.eligibleBullet02: be designed to be mounted on existing drills or soil tillage equipment
eligible.eligibleBullet04: be able to drill small cover crop seeds
eligible.eligibleBullet05: use either pipes, coulters or spreader plates to place the seed
eligible.eligibleBullet07: have a seed hopper with a minimum 300L capacity
